lal11:7: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvadvivṛddhaḥ kumāraḥ | athāpareṇa samayena kumārastadanyaiḥ kumārairamātyaputraiḥ sārdhaṁ kṛṣigrāmavalokayituṁ gacchati sma | avalokya ca kṛṣikarmāntamanyata udyānabhūmiṁ praviśati sma | saṁvignamanāstatra bodhisattva ekākī advitīyo ’nucaṁkramyamāṇo ’nuvicaran jambuvṛkṣamapaśyat prāsādikaṁ darśanīyam | tatra bodhisattvaśchāyāyāṁ paryaṅkena niṣīdati sma | niṣaṇṇaśca bodhisattvaścittaikāgratāmāsādayati sma | āsādya ca viviktaṁ kāmairviviktaṁ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ prītisukhaṁ prathamaṁ dhyānamupasaṁpadya viharati sma | sa vitarkavicārāṇāṁ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṁprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṁ samādhijaṁ prītisukhaṁ dvitīyaṁ dhyānamupasaṁpadya viharati sma | sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṁprajānan | sukhaṁ ca kāyena pratisaṁvedayati sma | yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī niṣprītikaṁ tṛtīyaṁ dhyānamusaṁpadya viharati sma | sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṁgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṁ caturthaṁ dhyānamupasaṁpadya viharati sma ||
lal11:8: tena ca samayena pañca ṛṣayo bāhyāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ ṛddhimanto vihāyasaṁgamā dakṣiṇāyā diśa uttarāṁ diśaṁ gacchanti sma | te tasya vanakhaṇḍasyopari gacchantaḥ pratyāhatā iva na śaknuvanti sma gantum | te saṁvignaromakūpajātā imāṁ gāthāmabhāṣanta—
lal11:11: gaja iva sahakāraśākhākulāṁ vṛkṣavṛndāṁ pradāritva nirdhāvitānekaśaḥ |
lal11:12: vayamiha marūṇāṁ pure cāpyasaktā gatā yakṣagandharvaveśmani cordhvaṁ nabhe niśritā
lal11:13: ima puna vanakhaṇḍamāsādya sīdāma bhoḥ kasya lakṣmī nivarteti ṛddherbalam ||
lal11:16: atha yā tatra vanakhaṇḍadevatā sā tānṛṣīn gāthayādhyabhāṣat—
lal11:22: tataste ’dhastādavalokayanto ’drākṣuḥ kumāraṁ śriyā tejasā ca jājvalyamānam | teṣāmetadabhūt—ko nvayaṁ niṣaṇṇaḥ? mā haiva vaiśravaṇo dhanādhipatirbhavet | āhosvinmāraḥ kāmādhipatiḥ | atha mahoragendraḥ |  athendro vajradharaḥ | atha rudraḥ kumbhāṇḍādhipatiḥ | atha kṛṣṇo mahotsāhaḥ | uta candro devaputraḥ | uta sūryaḥ sahasraraśmiḥ | uta rājā cakravartī bhaviṣyati? tasyāṁ ca velāyāmimāṁ gāthāmabhāṣanta—
lal11:25: āho vajradharasya caiva pratimā candro ’tha sūryo hyayam |
lal11:26: kāmāgrādhipatiśca vā pratikṛtī rūdrasya kṛṣṇasya vā
lal11:30: tataḥ sā vanadevatā tānṛṣīn gāthayā pratyabhāṣat—
lal11:32: yā śrī ca vaiśravaṇe ca vai nivasate yā vā sahasrekṣaṇe
lal11:34: brahme yā ca sahāpatau nivasate kṛṣṇe ca yā ca śriyā
lal11:35: sā śrī prāpya imaṁ hi śākyatanayaṁ nopaiti kāṁcitkalām ||
lal11:37: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasyā devatāyā vacanamupaśritya dharaṇītale pratiṣṭhante | te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṁ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam | te bodhisattvamupanidhyāya gāthābhirabhituṣṭuvuḥ | tatraika āha—
lal11:40: ayaṁ taṁ prāpsyate dharmaṁ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati ||
lal11:62: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ | rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma | so ’vocat—kumāraḥ kva gataḥ? nainaṁ paśyāmīti | tatra mahājanakāyo nirdhāvito ’bhūt kumāraṁ parigaveṣamāṇaḥ | tato ’nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṁ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṁ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṁ dhyāyantam | sarvavṛkṣāṇāṁ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt | jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṁ na vijahāti sma | sa taṁ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṁ śīghraṁ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṁ śuddhodanamupasaṁkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata—
lal11:65: yathā śakro ’thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate ||
lal11:67: sainaṁ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṁ purūṣottamam ||
lal11:69: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṁkrāmat | so ’drākṣīdbodhisattvaṁ śriyā tejasā ca jvalantam | dṛṣṭā caimāṁ gāthāmabhāṣat—
lal11:71: hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṁsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ |
lal11:72: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṁ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam ||
lal11:76: yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman |
lal11:77: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka ||
lal11:79: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṁ kurvanti sma | tānamātyā evamāhuḥ—mā śabdaṁ mā śabdaṁ kārṣṭeti | te ’vocan—kimetaditi | amātyā āhuḥ—
lal11:82: dhyāyantaṁ girinicalaṁ narendraputraṁ siddhārthaṁ na jahati saiva vṛkṣachāyā ||
lal11:86: grīṣme vasanta samudāgata jeṣṭhamāse saṁpuṣpite kusumapallavasaṁprakīrṇe |
lal11:88: chando ’bhyuvāca parivāritu dārikebhiḥ hantā kumāra vani gacchama locanārtham |
lal11:89: kiṁ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya hanta vrajāma vaya codananārisaṁgham ||
lal11:90: madhyāhnakālasamaye suviśuddhasattvaḥ pañcāśataiḥ parivṛtaiḥ saha ceṭakebhiḥ |
lal11:91: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā so ’buddha niṣkrāmiti gacchi kṛṣāṇagrāmam ||
lal11:93: dṛṣṭvā kumāra pratibuddha dukhena cotto dhiksaṁskṛteti bahuduḥkha kṛṣī karoti ||
lal11:94: so jambuchāyamupagamya vinītacitto tṛṇakāni gṛhya svaya saṁstaru saṁstaritvā |
lal11:95: paryaṅkamābhujiya ujju karitva kāyaṁ catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ ||
lal11:96: pañcā ṛṣī khagapathena hi gacchamānā jambūya mūrdhni na prabhonti parākrametum |
lal11:97: te visthitā nihatamānamadāśca bhūtvā sarve samagrasahitā samudīkṣayanto ||
lal11:98: vaya meruparvatavaraṁ tatha cakravālān nirbhidya gacchama javena asajjamānāḥ |
lal11:99: te jambuvṛkṣa na prabhoma atikrametuṁ ko nvatra heturayamadya bhaviṣyatīha ||
lal11:100: avatīrya medinitale ca pratiṣṭhihitvā paśyanti śākyatanayaṁ tahi jambumūle |
lal11:101: jambunadārcisadṛśaṁ prabhatejaraśmiṁ paryaṅkabandhu tada dhyāyatu bodhisattvam ||
lal11:102: te vismitā daśanakhā kariyāna mūrdhni praṇatā kṛtāñjalipuṭā nipatan krameṣu |
lal11:103: sādho sujāta sumukhaṁ karuṇā jagasya śīghraṁ vibuddha amṛte vinayasva sattvān ||
lal11:104: parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā olambate drumavaraṁ yatha padmapatram |
lal11:105: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya ||
lal11:106: śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṁpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ |
lal11:107: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṁpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ ||
lal11:108: śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṁ dauvārikaṁ tathapi cāntajanaṁ samantāt |
lal11:109: dṛṣṭaṁ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam ||
lal11:110: so śīghrameva tvaritaṁ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṁ praviṣṭam |
lal11:111: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṁ śiriyā jvalantam ||
lal11:112: mukuṭaṁ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam |
lal11:113: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṁ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ ||
lal11:114: paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām |
lal11:115: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṁbodhicittu janayaṁ dṛḍhaāśayena ||
lal11:116: so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṁ smṛtu saṁprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ |
lal11:117: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa ||
lal11:118: yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṁ |
lal11:119: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra ||
lal11:120: anuśāsayitva pitaraṁ janapāriṣadyāṁ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṁ puna so pravekṣī |
lal11:121: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṁ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ ||
